Module moffett.scheduler
Package moffett.scheduler.controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
moffett.scheduler.controller.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class that allows the user to log in to the scheduler app, establishes a database connection, and generates a history of login attempts.
